2577B2B4.Mod1_Description: Direct damage with {c_important}Rend{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Fury.

62F3D8B8.Mod5_Description: Dealing direct damage with {c_important}Rend{/c} extends the duration of {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} on enemies by {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds.

F2DE8628.simple_desc: Fury Skill: Rend enemies in front of you, inflicting heavy bleeding.
